description: Search for files matching a glob pattern and then search within those files for lines matching a regular expression

projectName.description: Project name, must be a valid file directory name

globPattern.description: Glob pattern to match files against

regex.description: Regular expression pattern to search for within matching files

limitPerFile.description: Maximum number of matching lines to return per file (0 for unlimited)

totalLimit.description: Maximum total number of matching lines across all files (0 for unlimited)
